recommendations: Peter Williams “In the time I worked with Shailesh I was very impressed by the consistently strong results that he produced in very different areas. He is extremely results focused, and is able to produce under very adverse conditions. In one instance, I worked with Shailesh to help him develop an application for the desk he was supporting. Shailesh was totally unfamiliar with the application framework, but was able to produce a high quality app for the desk with minimal guidance from me.”

Fariq Merchant “Shailesh was very instrumental to the group because of his strong quantitative skills and innovative ideas. His good personal skills and respect for others makes him a natural leader.”
